name: Uber Destruction
description:
Uber Destruction is a 2D fast-pace side-scrolling roguelike
with many traditional mechanics you know and love!
The game carries many different elements that create a fun,
and chaotic atmosphere so that you can become "Thee Über Destructor".

Hoards of Immense Challenging Foes!


The roads will be swarmed with all sorts of crazy beings... KILL. THEM. ALL.

An Armory of Weapons To Blaze With!


With over 30+ unique weapons with different rarities, you'll be
finding many creative ways to defeat your foes!

Hella Cool Upgrades!


A variety of very rewarding perks that enhance
the gameplay giving you much more power!

That's not all!

Uber destruction also includes:
  • Progression saving after each complete level
  • More rewarding and Chaotic madness as you progress
  • Couch Co-op with a friend (Requires Controller!)
    Possibly online multiplayer in the near future
  • In-game currency to earn and spend during gameplay

Consider Joining the official Discord server for updates!


https://discord.gg/2j2VCsg

Stay tuned!
